sightings.description: The bike is a 29er and a hardtail. The frame is entirely white except for black "Salsa" lettering on the underside of the down tube. I do not remember the exact size but is either a Large or Extra Large. The year is either a 2020 or 2021. The actual bike might have slightly different components than the included image, but the frame is identical. I do not have a picture of the actual bike, the image used is an online stock image of the bike.
sightings.title: 2021 Salsa Timberjack (hardtail)
sightings.Recent Sighting: I saw this bike in Wisconsin

sightings.description: My bike is mainly a saturated Red color and I lost it near Crystal Condo, 75 Englinton W, Mississauga, ON. The size and materials are only guesses, unfortunately. There was some dirt on the right handlebar. There are two gear options on each handle. The bicycle stand is damaged. Note: thief could have modified one or more of these descriptors. It was stolen on Sep 13, 2021. A link to an image of the bike: https://ibb.co/mDMLTQF
sightings.title: CCM Unknown

sightings.description: Has Rokform phone mount on stem.  Had vinyl decals of my name, Brian Ripley, on the down tube just below water bottle cage.  You can see them in image.  They have been on for some time, so I imagine if they are removed, there would at least be some adhesive residue remaining.  Also has Shimano PD-M540 pedals (pretty sure this is the correct model number, but if not, they are a variant that looks just like them).
sightings.title: 2009 Trek Madone 4.7
